description_html: The unusual material of the tops, previewed at the Salone, is a special resin in which, through a complex semi-artisanal process, a fabric developed especially by Rubelli has been incorporated. Enclosed in the transparent slab the fabric, produced in the gold, silver and bronze metallic versions, has the special feature of not appearing flattened and of retaining its 3D appearance, with a trompe-l’oeil effect.
